reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of PHYS 102, PHYS 108, PHYS 118, PHYS 158, PHYS 153, SCIE 001.
Co-reqs: One of MATH 152, MATH 221, MATH 223.
WAIT LIST: register on the wait list if you are not eligible for the restricted seats. You will be moved into the course if space becomes available.
description: Introduction to UNIX/Linux; software tools for processing, fitting and displaying data; numerical methods and application in the physical sciences.
